channel.title: Another dissapointment from the Asian ran RS2 Websites
channel.description: So i went to ask these people how much my pure would be they said $4. i said LOL Than i asked for my 100+4 how much and they didn't respond... here is their response... [IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/dissapointment.jpg[/img] What i learned: Never try to make a conversation with a person named Elva yu

item.title: Another dissapointment from the Asian ran RS2 Websites
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“Project Epic, post:1, topic:385152”][quote author=rant link=topic=480689.msg3520875#msg3520875 date=1299388925]

So i went to ask these people how much my pure would be they said $4. i said LOL
Than i asked for my 100+4 how much and they didn’t respond… here is their response…

What i learned: Never try to make a conversation with a person named Elva yu

i like how the avatar is a white woman
[/quote]

LOL.[/quote]I don’t think that is supposed to be her. Just a picture of a friendly person to project the idea of “Friendly people.” But yet, they aren’t…

Read full topic

So i went to ask these people how much my pure would be they said $4. i said LOL
Than i asked for my 100+4 how much and they didn’t respond… here is their response…
[/IMG]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz305/stuartperera/dissapointment.jpg[/img]
What i learned: Never try to make a conversation with a person named Elva yu

i like how the avatar is a white woman

Can I slap you as hard as I can?
[/quote]Who me?![/quote]
Yes. The white woman is the default avatar.

item.title: Another dissapointment from the Asian ran RS2 Websites
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:15, topic:384924”][quote author=RiiPiiNFtW link=topic=480689.msg3520380#msg3520380 date=1299362799]

[quote author=LilXCj link=topic=480689.msg3520376#msg3520376 date=1299362644]

It’s too bad. I’m Asian. Someday you guys will realize that internet speak is harder to learn when you barely know English.
[/quote]Not saying all asians… just the asians that run these shit websites…

Then don’t go to them. Simple. Or you could fix your sentence structures and spelling before speaking to them again. I’m sure they would understand then.
[/quote] It’s fun to test a foreigner’s english at times. Although i did not intend it at that time, its funny to look at now. I laugh at it when i look at it.

With what you provided to me, you must think it’s okay to confuse a foreigner. So take this example, you’re visiting another country and someone decides to test your fluency in their language by either cussing you out or disrespecting you.

Get the idea?[/quote]Shoot dude… I’d laugh at them and say “WTF?!”

Read full topic
item.source: Another dissapointment from the Asian ran RS2 Websites

item.title: Another dissapointment from the Asian ran RS2 Websites
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“RiiPiiNFtW, post:14, topic:384924”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=480689.msg3520376#msg3520376 date=1299362644]

[quote author=RiiPiiNFtW link=topic=480689.msg3520374#msg3520374 date=1299362552]

It’s too bad. I’m Asian. Someday you guys will realize that internet speak is harder to learn when you barely know English.
[/quote]Not saying all asians… just the asians that run these shit websites…

Then don’t go to them. Simple. Or you could fix your sentence structures and spelling before speaking to them again. I’m sure they would understand then.
[/quote] It’s fun to test a foreigner’s english at times. Although i did not intend it at that time, its funny to look at now. I laugh at it when i look at it.[/quote]

With what you provided to me, you must think it’s okay to confuse a foreigner. So take this example, you’re visiting another country and someone decides to test your fluency in their language by either cussing you out or disrespecting you.

Get the idea?

Read full topic

I’m sure they would understand then.[/quote] It’s fun to test a foreigner’s english at times. Although i did not intend it at that time, its funny to look at now. I laugh at it when i look at it.
